attributes.action: acknowledge ULG as a genuine religion.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The World Of Warcraft European server known as Stormreaver has a Horde guild called ULG. The members of the guild feel that society and Government is both ignorant and dismissive of our religion and as a result we petition the Prime Minister to accept the ULG

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
